vernac_cmds: Definition nminimal (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist) := forall (c : form) (k : kripke_tree), Is_Monotone_kripke_tree k -> forces_ngamma work ds ni ai a k -> In c context -> forces_t k c.

Lemma nminimal_derivable_forces : forall (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist) (k : kripke_tree), Is_Monotone_kripke_tree k -> forces_ngamma work ds ni ai a k -> nminimal work ds ni ai a context -> forall c : form, Derivable context c -> forces_t k c.
intros work ds ni ai a context k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma mon c der_c.
apply soundness_t with t context; try assumption.

Lemma nminimal_eqv : forall (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni1 ni2 : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), eqv_ni ni1 ni2 -> nminimal work ds ni1 ai a context -> nminimal work ds ni2 ai a context.
intros work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context eq12 mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces in_a.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ds : forall (i j : Int) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), nminimal (NDisj i j :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal work ((i, j) :: ds) ni ai a context.
intros i j work ds ni ai a context mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ni : forall (x : nested_imp) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), nminimal (NImp_NF (nested_imp2nimp x) :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal work ds (x :: ni) ai a context.
intros x work ds ni ai a context mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ai_new : forall (i : Int) (b : normal_form) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai ai' : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), (forall bs : nf_list, LOOKUP nf_list i ai bs -> False) -> EQUIV_INS nf_list i (cons b) nf_nil ai ai' -> nminimal (AImp i b :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal work ds ni ai' a context.
intros i b work ds ni ai ai' a context lookup equiv_ins mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ai_old : forall (i : Int) (b : normal_form) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (bs : nf_list) (ai ai' : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), LOOKUP nf_list i ai bs -> EQUIV_INS nf_list i (cons b) nf_nil ai ai' -> nminimal (AImp i b :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal work ds ni ai' a context.
intros i b work ds ni bs ai ai' a context notlookup equiv_ins mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.
apply forces_ngamma_shift_ai_work_old with bs ai'; assumption.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_a : forall (i : Int) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a a' : atoms) (context : flist), EQUIV_INS unit i (fun _ : unit => tt) tt a a' -> nminimal (NAtom i :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal work ds ni ai a' context.
intros i work ds ni ai a a' context equiv_ins mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ni_x_ni : forall (x : nested_imp) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni1 ni2 : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), nminimal (NImp_NF (nested_imp2nimp x) :: work) ds (ni1 ++ ni2) ai a context -> nminimal work ds (ni1 ++ x :: ni2) ai a context.
intros x work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.

Lemma nminimal_shift_ni_x_ni_work : forall (x : nested_imp) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni1 ni2 : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), nminimal work ds (ni1 ++ x :: ni2) ai a context -> nminimal (NImp_NF (nested_imp2nimp x) :: work) ds (ni1 ++ ni2) ai a context.
intros x work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.

Lemma nminimal_cons_work_strength : forall (b c : normal_form) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), (forall k : kripke_tree, Is_Monotone_kripke_tree k -> forces_ngamma (c :: work) ds ni ai a k -> forces_t k (nf2form b)) -> nminimal (b :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal (c :: work) ds ni ai a context.
intros b c work ds ni ai a context forces_cb minimal.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c0.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.

Lemma nminimal_cons_work_weak : forall (b c : normal_form) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), (forall k : kripke_tree, Is_Monotone_kripke_tree k -> forces_t k (nf2form c) -> forces_t k (nf2form b)) -> nminimal (b :: work) ds ni ai a context -> nminimal (c :: work) ds ni ai a context.
intros b c work ds ni ai a context forces_cb minimal.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c0.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.

Lemma nminimal_shift_work_ai_weak : forall (i : Int) (bs work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai ai' : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), LOOKUP nf_list i ai bs -> EQUIV_DEL nf_list i ai ai' -> nminimal work ds ni ai a context -> nminimal (bs ++ work) ds ni ai' a context.
intros i bs work ds ni ai ai' a context lookup equiv_del min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.
apply forces_ngamma_del_ai_rev with i bs ai'; try assumption.
simpl in |- *; apply forces_b__forces_a_imp_b_t; try assumption.

Lemma nminimal_shift_ds_work_context : forall (work : nf_list) (c : normal_form) (i j : Int) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), (forall k : kripke_tree, Is_Monotone_kripke_tree k -> forces_t k (nf2form c) -> forces_t k (OrF (Atom i) (Atom j))) -> nminimal work ((i, j) :: ds) ni ai a context -> nminimal (c :: work) ds ni ai a (nf2form c :: context).
intros work c i j ds ni ai a context forces_ij mon.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_context.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.

Lemma nminimal_cons_work_cons_context : forall (c : normal_form) (work : nf_list) (ds : disjs) (ni : nested_imps) (ai : atomic_imps) (a : atoms) (context : flist), nminimal work ds ni ai a context -> nminimal (c :: work) ds ni ai a (nf2form c :: context).
intros c work ds ni ai a context min.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c0.

apply soundness_t with t context; try assumption.
intros work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context eq12 mon.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces in_a.

intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.

intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_a.
intros x work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.
intros x work ds ni1 ni2 ai a context min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.
intros b c work ds ni ai a context forces_cb minimal.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c0.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.
intros b c work ds ni ai a context forces_cb minimal.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c0.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.
intros i bs work ds ni ai ai' a context lookup equiv_del min.
intros c k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_c.
apply forces_ngamma_del_ai_rev with i bs ai'; try assumption.
simpl in |- *; apply forces_b__forces_a_imp_b_t; try assumption.
intros work c i j ds ni ai a context forces_ij mon.
intros c0 k k_is_mon k_forces_ngamma in_context.
apply forces_ngamma_cons_work_weak with c; try assumption.
intros c work ds ni ai a context min.
